headline: Buy 5 Aerospace Defense Stocks for Second-Half 2025 on Growing Demand
summary: Buy-rated aerospace defense stocks like GE, HWM, LDOS, HII & EVTL are likely to surge in second-half 2025 amid rising budget and air travel demand.

raw.headline: Buy 5 Aerospace Defense Stocks for Second-Half 2025 on Growing Demand

headline: 2 Reasons to Avoid LDOS and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Leidos trades at $152.40 per share and has stayed right on track with the overall market, losing 7.1% over the last six months while the S&P 500 is down 3.3%. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
